VelocityScale: The scale applied to the velocity. (Only used if 'Velocity' is checked).
StartLocation: The location of the bounding primitive relative to the position of the emitter.
Positive_X: Whether the positive X axis is valid for spawning.
Positive_Y: Whether the positive Y axis is valid for spawning.
Positive_Z: Whether the positive Z axis is valid for spawning.
Negative_X: Whether the negative X axis is valid for spawning.
Negative_Y: Whether the negative Y axis is valid for spawning.
Negative_Z: Whether the negative Zaxis is valid for spawning.
SurfaceOnly: Whether particles will only spawn on the surface of the primitive.
Velocity: Whether the particle should get its velocity from the position within the primitive.
